items.sentence: Should I put this bag in the overhead compartment?
The play was so boring Tom and I both fell asleep.
I looked at Tom and saw that he was still smiling.
I only eat meat about three or four times a month.
I don\'t want you to have anything to do with Tom.
I emailed Tom and told him I\'d be busy next week.
Let\'s eat the ice cream now. It\'s going to melt.
That\'s just one of the reasons I don\'t like Tom.
That happened to you because you weren\'t careful.
I got to know Tom when I was a university student.
